name: Better Usage Statistics for Elementor
author: pr24ch

sections.installation:
1. Download, unzip and upload to your WordPress plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin within you WordPress Administration Backend
sections.description:
Better usage statistics for elementor shows the overall total elements usage and elements usage per page. This is useful when using additional element packs to get a better understanding of where these elements are used. And it’s very helpful when you need to resolve conflicts or when you want to remove an additional element pack.

This plugin is very lightweight and does not affect the front-end of your website. Of course, this plugin makes no sense if you don’t use elementor ðŸ˜‰
